item.title: Production Ready Asp.Net Core WebAPI - 1. Installation and Setup
item.author: aseem.gaurav@outlook.com (Aseem Gaurav)
item.description: Below is a list of software and applications we will use throughout this blog series. This post only covers the software needed for the first post. As we move forward, each post will contain information about what to install for that particular section. Download and Install VS Code VS Code Extensions C# for Visual Studio Code (powered by OmniSharp C# IDE Extensions for VSCode Icons for Visual Studio Code Dotnet Core - Download latest version of .

item.title: Production Ready Asp.Net Core WebAPI
item.author: aseem.gaurav@outlook.com (Aseem Gaurav)
item.description: Now that dotnet core version 5 has been available for some time, looking at its progress, adoption and community support, I truly believe that it is ready for prime time. It is one of the best open source frameworks to build all kinds of applications, including web api’s or backend services. There are lots of resources available on building api’s with .Net core but very few cover every aspect of it.
